original_text: but standing by the cross of Jesus were his mother and his mother's sister, Mary the wife of Clopas, and Mary Magdalene.
korean_text: 예수의 십자가 곁에는 그 어머니와 이모와 글로바의 아내 마리아와 막달라 마리아가 섰는지라

sentences.original_text: but standing by the cross of Jesus
were his mother and his mother's sister
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 어머니와 그 어머니의 자매가 있었는데
